42746.name: Biofuels Production - Ktoe
42746.description:
Renewable energy -  Biofuels production Notes: Consumption of fuel ethanol and biodiesel is included in oil consumption tables. 

Annual changes and shares of total are calculated using thousand tonnes a day oil equivalent figures.Growth rates are adjusted for leap years.
